actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

official_title: A bill for the relief of River Publishers, Inc. of Wharton, Texas.

summary.text: Relieves a named Texas corporation of all liability for payment to the United States of a specified sum representing an amount such corporation owed the United States for certain postage expenses based upon erroneous postal rates specified by the appropriate postmaster.Authorizes and directs the Secretary of the Treasury to pay to such corporation an amount equal to the sum of any payments paid by it to the United States on account of such liability.

titles.title: A bill for the relief of River Publishers, Inc. of Wharton, Texas.
